thread.title: Driver seriously injures Newport pedestrian
thread.title_full: Driver seriously injures Newport pedestrian - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Driver seriously injures Newport pedestrian
text:
NEWPORT, Vt. (AP) - Police in Newport, Vermont, say a local woman suffered life-threatening injuries when she was struck by a car.
Authorities say they are still investigating the accident on Pleasant Street Saturday afternoon that injured 53-year-old Cindy Combs of Newport.
Combs was taken to North Country Hospital and later transported to Dartmouth Hitchcock Medical Center in New Hampshire.
Police say the driver of the car - 51-year-old Tina Phillips - was not injured.
